name: The Creature Inside
description:
Only tested on the Oculus Rift.

You are cursed. At midnight you transform into a hideous creature out for blood. You have one chance to cure yourself tonight.

Follow the instructions that appear in the book on your desk to mix a potion that will  cure you... but you’ve forgotten where the ingredients are...search for them in your room.

Use the burner plate to heat potions and place potions on the window sill to cool them to the correct temperature for mixing.

Potions will shatter if you heat or cool them for too long and you will need to start again.

Use the trigger buttons to open doors and drawers and to pick up potions.

Hold X or A and point to a l ocation and releaseto teleport around the room. You don’t have much time before you permanently transform and kill again. Good luck, my friend.
